prompt: Create a polished pop song arrangement with clear drums, bass, synths, and polished production. Do not use text-to-speech vocals. Produce an instrumental pop track. Use the provided source facts only as internal inspiration for rhythm and emotion, not as lyrics. Keep it energetic, radio-friendly, and fully musical.
lyrics:
[Instrumental]
No lead vocals. No rap or spoken narration.
Facts to inspire the composition:
1) The organizers posted a full prize breakdown for AWS, Datadog, Neo4j, MiniMax, and TestSprite tracks.
2) Some participants had private marketplace and IAM permission failures when attempting Bedrock access during setup.
3) Team members requested a direct AWS support contact and asked if a designated technical support channel existed.
4) Bedrock inference worked while deploying services like EC2 often failed under permissions.
5) Lenka confirmed participants should submit a GitHub link, demo video, track selections, and product answers.
6) AWS (amazing) and CopilotKit (amazing) were noted as updated prize tracks.
[Instrumental_End]
